column4: Is Eft considered a "stable" release, or in transition to a stable one?
it's a stable release, although probably in some marginal ways not as stable, since long term support hasn't been applied to it
i think it contains some applications that are fairly new, stuff like that that made them not give it LTS (long term support)
Yeah, that makes sense...so far I haven't had any problems save for the screensavers not working
